short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays information about Therapy Trainings™ when clicked.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Therapy Trainings™ provides on-demand, state-approved continuing education (CE) courses for mental health professionals, including social workers, counselors, psychologists, marriage and family therapists (MFTs), and peer support specialists.

With this extension, you can easily access our platform to explore a wide range of CE courses, receive instant certificates upon completion, and track your progress—all in one place. Our courses cover essential topics such as Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Domestic Violence, and more. Whether you're a recent graduate or an experienced professional, Therapy Trainings™ helps you meet licensure requirements with flexibility and affordability.
